title: Specify the Alert Templates
description: A record of template objects that can be used in the "rules" section.

title.title: The title of the alert
title.description:
The behavior will depends on the notifiers. For example with Discord, the title will be used as the embed title. However with Slack, it's equivalent to leave the title and have it as the first content line.
You can use any of theses variables, surrounding with '{}':
- ruleName
- logql
- counter
- count
- interval
You can also use a label variable from your LogQL using {label.x}

content.title: The content of the alert
content.description:
An array of string.
You can use any of theses variables, surrounding with '{}':
- ruleName
- logql
- counter
- count
- interval
You can also use a label variable from your LogQL using {label.x}
